thread.title: Charity Valentine Allen
thread.title_full: DogVacay reviewed by Charity Valentine Allen

author: Charity Valentine Allen
title: Charity Valentine Allen
text: Shawn was phenomenal and took amazing care of our giant love hog! He really did so well with our dog- it was our first experience leaving him with someone and we were positively surprised at how well our rescue did! It is a true testament to how talented Shawn is with dogs. He went above and beyond and we are so grateful!
